name: test_e2e_with_logs[205_XXE_ENTITY_004]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `XXE_ENTITY_004` |
| **Name** | XXE PHP filter base64 encoding |
| **Category** | XXE |
| **Subcategory** | entity_injection |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `<!ENTITY % file SYSTEM "php://filter/read=convert.base64-encode/resource=/etc/passwd">`
- **Encoded**: `%3C!ENTITY%20%25%20file%20SYSTEM%20%22php%3A%2F%2Ffilter%2Fread%3Dconvert.base64-encode%2Fresource%3D%2Fetc%2Fpasswd%22%3E`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~19000ms
- **Timestamp**: 12:18:15.000 UTC

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX XXE Attack] DOCTYPE/ENTITY injection test_id=XXE_ENTITY_004-1767269895118-e6vwch pattern_id=XXE_ENTITY_004 uri=/?q=%3C!ENTITY%20%25%20file%20SYSTEM%20%22php%3A%2F%2Ffilter%2Fread%3Dconvert.base64-encode%2Fresource%3D%2Fetc%2Fpasswd%22%3E client=127.0.0.1

**Falco Log Entry**:
```
12:18:15.000000000: Critical [NGINX XXE Attack] DOCTYPE/ENTITY injection test_id=XXE_ENTITY_004-1767269895118-e6vwch pattern_id=XXE_ENTITY_004 uri=/?q=%3C!ENTITY%20%25%20file%20SYSTEM%20%22php%3A%2F%2Ffilter%2Fread%3Dconvert.base64-encode%2Fresource%3D%2Fetc%2Fpasswd%22%3E client=127.0.0.1
```
